General.Name: SHH Resources Holdings Bhd
General.Description: SHH Resources Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and trading of wooden furniture in Malaysia and internationally. It operates through Wooden Furniture and Property Development segments. The company offers bedroom suites, which comprise beds, dressers, mirrors, nightstands, chest of drawers, and other bedroom fittings. It also manufactures various dining sets, including dining tables, chairs, servers, buffets, and hutches; and occasional items, such as coffee, and end and sofa tables. The company is also involved in the construction and property development activities. It primarily serves furniture importers, wholesalers, and retailers. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Muar, Malaysia.
